citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1305 on
17-JUL-17. I went to the licensee's house and knocked on the door. No one answered. I honked my car horn. I
contacted the licensee by phone. She informed me she would not be able to make herself available to do the
inspection with me. She gave me her optimal hours. I told her I would try back another time.
End of report.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1305 on
17-JUL-17.  I went to the licensee's house and knocked on the door.  No one answered.  I honked my car horn.  I
contacted the licensee by phone.  She informed me she would not be able to make herself available to do the
inspection with me.  She gave me her optimal hours.  I told her I would try back another time.
End of report.
